top_categories.workout_context: Kal-Tour Dirty 100's Michigan rolling gravel rewards steady threshold power. Surging and recovering costs more watts than just holding.
At mile 60 of 100, glycogen is gone. This workout teaches your body to produce watts on fumes.
Kal-Tour Dirty 100's Michigan rolling, Local event forces constant power changes. Surge over the rough stuff, settle on the smooth, repeat for 100 miles.
88–92% FTP is where you'll spend the hardest sustained miles of Kal-Tour Dirty 100. Train it until it feels boring.
Race-pace efforts that mimic Kal-Tour Dirty 100's demands. Pacing, fueling, and tactical decisions under fatigue. Practice the race before February.
At Kal-Tour Dirty 100, surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding. Over-unders train exactly that.
100 miles rewards fat oxidation. This volume work shifts your fuel mix so you're still burning fat at hour 5, not bonking at hour 3.
Every hard session works better with a bigger aerobic base. At 100 miles, base fitness is the difference between racing and surviving.
Endurance with intensity spikes baked in. Exactly what 4,500ft of climbing on Michigan rolling gravel does to your power file on race day.
Two threshold sessions per week without the recovery cost of VO2max work. For 100 miles, sustainable FTP gains matter more than peak power.
Tempo is Kal-Tour Dirty 100's race pace. The wattage you'll hold for 100 miles on Michigan rolling gravel. Train it until it's automatic.
Varied gradients on Michigan rolling gravel demand climbing versatility. Sit the shallow stuff, stand the steep stuff, switch without thinking.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 60–80g carbs/hour for Kal-Tour Dirty 100’s 100 miles. Start fueling within the first 30 minutes — early fueling prevents late-race collapse. Bonking at mile 60 is a nutrition failure, not a fitness failure.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Kal-Tour Dirty 100 requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on michigan rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: michigan rolling, local event, midwest gravel.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on TT Threshold, Durability, and Gravel Specific to prepare you for 100 miles of michigan rolling gravel in Kalamazoo, Michigan.
